pageSetting.title: 行员考核得分明细查询

attribute.value: select fabh as key,famc as value from khfa_fapz where khnf= cast(substr('$tjrq$',1,4) as integer) and yyzlbh=2 and khdx='2'
select distinct pz.wdmc as key, pz.wdmc as value from khfa_fapz fa inner join khfa_khzbpz pz on fa.fabh=pz.fabh where fa.khdx='2' and fa.yyzlbh=2 and pz.fabh = $fabh$

select distinct pz.khzbdh as key, case when zb.khzbdh is null then pz.xmmc else zb.khzbmc end as value from khfa_fapz fa inner join khfa_khzbpz pz on fa.fabh=pz.fabh left join khfa_khzb_hy zb on zb.khzbdh=pz.khzbdh where fa.khdx='2' and fa.yyzlbh=2 and pz.fabh = $fabh$ and pz.wdmc = '$wdmc$'

select distinct hylb.lbdh as key,hylb.lbmc as value from khfa_fapz fapz inner join khfa_yyjg_hy yyjg on fapz.fabh=yyjg.fabh inner join khdx_hylb hylb on hylb.khdxdh=yyjg.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq where fapz.khdx='2' and fapz.yyzlbh=2 and yyjg.tjrq=$tjrq$ and yyjg.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and yyjg.fabh=$fabh$

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select $tjrq$ tjrq,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc, hy.hydh,hy.hymc,hylb.lbmc,khfa.famc, zbpz.wdmc, case when khzb.khzbmc is null then zbpz.xmmc else khzb.khzbmc end as khzbmc , yyjg.yyjg,yyjg.zbz,yyjg.jhz,zbpz.bdz, zbpz.fdz, yyjg.yysm from khfa_yyjg_hy yyjg inner join khfa_fapz khfa on khfa.fabh = yyjg.fabh inner join khdx_hy hy on yyjg.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) inner join table(fn_getsjjg_java_qxhy($tjrq$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qx on qx.khdxdh=hy.KHDXDH inner join khdx_hylb hylb on hy.khdxdh=hylb.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq inner join khdx_jgcy cy on hy.khdxdh=cy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on cy.jgkhdxdh=jg.khdxdh left join khfa_khzb_hy khzb on khzb.khzbdh=yyjg.khzbdh left join khfa_khzbpz zbpz on zbpz.fabh=yyjg.fabh and zbpz.khzbdh=yyjg.khzbdh where 1=1 and khfa.fabh = $fabh$ and yyjg.tjrq=$tjrq$ and zbpz.wdmc = '$wdmc$' and zbpz.khzbdh=$khzbdh$ and hylb.lbdh = '$hylb$' and khfa.yyzlbh=2 and khfa.khdx='2' order by khfa.fabh desc,zbpz.wdmc,yyjg.yyjg desc,jg.khdxdh,hy.khdxdh

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select $tjrq$ tjrq,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc, hy.hydh,hy.hymc,hylb.lbmc,khfa.famc, zbpz.wdmc, case when khzb.khzbmc is null then zbpz.xmmc else khzb.khzbmc end as khzbmc , yyjg.yyjg,yyjg.zbz,yyjg.jhz,zbpz.bdz, zbpz.fdz, yyjg.yysm from khfa_yyjg_hy yyjg inner join khfa_fapz khfa on khfa.fabh = yyjg.fabh inner join khdx_hy hy on yyjg.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) inner join table(fn_getsjjg_java_qxhy($tjrq$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qx on qx.khdxdh=hy.KHDXDH inner join khdx_hylb hylb on hy.khdxdh=hylb.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq inner join khdx_jgcy cy on hy.khdxdh=cy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on cy.jgkhdxdh=jg.khdxdh left join khfa_khzb_hy khzb on khzb.khzbdh=yyjg.khzbdh left join khfa_khzbpz zbpz on zbpz.fabh=yyjg.fabh and zbpz.khzbdh=yyjg.khzbdh where 1=1 and khfa.fabh = $fabh$ and yyjg.tjrq=$tjrq$ and zbpz.wdmc = '$wdmc$' and zbpz.khzbdh=$khzbdh$ and hylb.lbdh = '$hylb$' and khfa.yyzlbh=2 and khfa.khdx='2' order by khfa.fabh desc,zbpz.wdmc,yyjg.yyjg desc,jg.khdxdh,hy.khdxdh ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select fabh as key,famc as value from khfa_fapz where khnf= cast(substr('$tjrq$',1,4) as integer) and yyzlbh=2 and khdx='2'
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select distinct pz.wdmc as key, pz.wdmc as value from khfa_fapz fa inner join khfa_khzbpz pz on fa.fabh=pz.fabh where fa.khdx='2' and fa.yyzlbh=2 and pz.fabh = $fabh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select distinct hylb.lbdh as key,hylb.lbmc as value from khfa_fapz fapz inner join khfa_yyjg_hy yyjg on fapz.fabh=yyjg.fabh inner join khdx_hylb hylb on hylb.khdxdh=yyjg.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq where fapz.khdx='2' and fapz.yyzlbh=2 and yyjg.tjrq=$tjrq$ and yyjg.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and yyjg.fabh=$fabh$
